author: hdformat
body:
<!--

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 and PowerShell 7+ issues.

- Make sure you are able to repro it on the [latest released version](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases)
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/known-issues-ps6?view=powershell-6).

-->
I 

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
PS > 1..3 | foreach { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" }
PS > 1..3 | foreach -parallel { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" } 
```

# Expected behavior

```powershell
PS > 1..3 | foreach { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" }
🤡
🤡
🤡
PS > 1..3 | foreach -parallel { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" } 
🤡
🤡
🤡
```

# Actual behavior

```powershell
PS > 1..3 | foreach { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" }
🤡
🤡
🤡
PS > 1..3 | foreach -parallel { iex "python -c `"print('🤡')`"" } 
Traceback (most recent call last):   
File "<string>", line 1, in <module> UnicodeEncodeError: 'cp949' codec can't encode character '\u2728' in position 0: illegal multibyte sequence
 Traceback (most recent call last):
 Traceback (most recent call last):   File "<string>", line 1, in <module> UnicodeEncodeError: 'cp949' codec can't encode character '\u2728' in position 0: illegal multibyte sequence   File "<string>", line 1, in <module> 
UnicodeEncodeError: 'cp949' codec can't encode character '\u2728' in position 0: illegal multibyte sequence â¨¯ 

```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
PS > chcp 
Active code page: 65001

PS > $PSVersionTable  
Name                           Value
 ----                           ----- 
PSVersion                      7.1.0-preview.2
 PSEdition                      Core
 GitCommitId                    7.1.0-preview.2 
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.19041 
Platform                       Win32NT 
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0â€¦}
 PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3 
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
 WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: hdformat
comments.body:
This can be seen where `Start-Job`

```powershell
PS > $j = start-job -scriptblock { python -c "print('🤡')"}

PS > Receive-Job $j
Traceback (most recent call last):   
File "<string>", line 1, in <module> 
UnicodeEncodeError: 'cp949' codec can't encode character '\U0001f921' in position 0: illegal multibyte sequence
```

title: parallel process does not keep default encoding (active code page)
